6.08: Faceless Void is now allowed to build a  Refresher Orb
6.12b: Chronosphere Fixed Chronosphere starting its effects before the cast point is reached. Reduced cast time from 1.5 to 0.5.
6.60: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Faceless Void: Increases  Chronosphere duration from 3/4/5 to 4/5/6 and reduces cooldown from 120/110/100 to 75 on each level.
6.66: Time Walk Increased movement speed slow from 10%/20%/30%/40% to 25%/30%/35%/40%. Increased attack speed slow from 10/20/30/40 to 25/30/35/40. Increased cooldown from 13 on each level to 19/17/15/14.
6.00: Faceless Void is now allowed to build a  Refresher Orb Stop Time Reduced duration from 3/4/5 to 3.5 on each level. Reduced cooldown from 180/240/300 to 210/150/90. Now also affects buildings.
6.04: Stop Time Reduced duration from 3.5 to 2.5. Increased manacost from 180/200/250 to 180/250/300.
6.19: Fixed a bug on  Time Walk.
6.06: Faceless Void is no longer allowed to build a  Refresher Orb Stop Time Reduced radius from global on each level to 1000/1500/2000. Increased cooldown from 210/150/110 to 240/185/145. No longer affects buildings.
6.07: Increased  strength gain from 2.05 to 2.2. Increased  Bash damage from 35 on each level to 40/50/60/70 Replaced Stop Time with Temporal Drag
6.05: Increased Stop Time cooldown from 210/150/90 to 210/150/110.
6.35: Increased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 3.94).
6.38: Increased base attack damage from 23-29 to 37-43 (total attack damage is now 58-64).
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.55: Reduced  Chronosphere cooldown from 165 on each level to 120/110/100.
6.79: Time Walk Increased movement speed slow from 25%/30%/35%/40% to 20%/30%/40%/50%. Increased attack speed slow from 25/30/35/40 to 20/30/40/50. Increased  Chronosphere radius from 400 to 450.
6.52: Reduced  strength gain from 2.2 to 1.4.  Time Walk Now moves at a constant speed of 2600, instead of reaching the targeted point within 1.5 seconds regardless of distance. Reduced cast time from 0.5 to 0.35. Reduced  Chronosphere cast time from 0.5 to 0.35.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Time Lock now deals twice as much damage when proccing on a unit inside his Chronosphere. Faceless Void can no longer be frozen by any  Chronosphere.
6.11: Reduced Time Walk attack damage bonus from 30%/60%/90%/120% to 15%/30%/45%/60%. Increased  Chronosphere cast time from 0.5 to 1.5
6.10: Replaced Carrion Swarm with Time Walk
6.72: Increased base health regeneration from 0.25 to 0.75  Time Walk now applies the slow around Faceless Void during the entire walk, instead of only at the destination.  Chronosphere Now reveals invisible units within the radius. Increased cast range from 500/550/600 to 600 on each level. Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Chronosphere cooldown from 75 to 60.
6.80: Reduced  Time Walk manacost from 120 to 90.  Chronosphere Now hastes all units owned by the caster to 1000 movement speed and turns them phased while inside the radius. Reduced cooldown from 120/110/100 to 120/100/80.
6.81: Increased base  agility from 21 to 23. Increased turn rate from 0.5 to 1.
6.82: Chronosphere Reduced radius from 450 to 425. Reduced flying vision radius from 1000 to 425. No longer disables passive abilities. Effects no longer linger for an extra 0.5 seconds at the end of its duration.
6.83: Time Walk no longer slows attack speed by 20/30/40/50.  Chronosphere Increased cooldown from 130/110/90 to 130/115/100. Ward unit types are no longer able to attack while inside.
6.84: Faceless Void is no longer restricted from buying  Skull Basher and  Abyssal Blade (their bashes are still disabled on Faceless Void).
6.25: Time Walk Fixed a bug which caused permanent invulnerability. Increased manacost from 60 to 100.
6.27b: Time Walk Increased manacost from 100 to 120. Increased cooldown from 12 to 13.
6.28: Time Walk Reduced movement speed slow from 15%/30%/45%/60% to 10%/20%/30%/40%. Reduced attack speed slow from 15/30/45/60 to 10/20/30/40.
6.48b: Chronosphere Reduced duration from 3/4.5/6 to 3/4/5. Reduced cast range from 500/600/700 to 500/550/600. Reduced manacost from 175/200/225 to 150/175/200. Reduced cooldown from 180 to 165.
